scripts.build-copy-push: tsc && npm run pre-remove-old && npm run remove-old && npm run copy && npm run push
scripts.docker-xdai-BUILD: git pull && docker image prune -a && docker build -t xdai-pga .
scripts.docker-xdai-START: npm run docker-xdai-BUILD && docker run -d --name xdai-pga --network="host" --restart=unless-stopped xdai-pga
scripts.docker-xdai-STOP: docker stop xdai-pga && docker container rm xdai-pga
scripts.copy: cp -a build/. ../../xdai-bot/deploy/build && cp Dockerfile ../../xdai-bot/deploy && cp package.json ../../xdai-bot/deploy
scripts.push: cd ../../xdai-bot && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push origin
